Title: Research project on diabetes demography

# Overview
Prevalence of type I and II diabetes has been increasing in Denmark since before the 1990s. 
This is in part due to increases in incidence, but also decreases in mortality due to improved treatment. 
As a consequence more diabetes patients reach a higher age and thus they become of risk of dying 
from age-related diseases such as cancer and dementia. Further, some cancers are related to obesity, 
which may put diabetes patients at a higher risk of getting such diseases. In this project we wanted to investigate...
